cause.description:
Mr.Warfel for those who do not know is the greatest thing to ever come to the Tampa Prep theater department. He has created many plays each show outdoing the last. Mr.Warfel who recently married has a dream I believe we can help him accomplish. Mr.Warfel's dream car is a Porsche please help me and make his dream come true.
1. Everyone's dreams are possible
2. Teachers give life lessons
cause.mission: Raise money in order to provide Mr.Warful with his dream car.
cause.name: Mr.Warfel's Porshe
